General.Name: Gansu Guofang Gongmao(Grp)
General.Description: Gansu Guofang Industry & Trade (Group) Co., Ltd. operates department retail stores in China. The company operates its stores under the Guofong Department Store, Guofong Comprehensive Super, and Guofong Electric Appliances brand names. Gansu Guofang Industry & Trade (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Lanzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 4-6, Square South Road, Lanzhou, China, 730000
